overview: Karina is the grim reaper of Mexico City, her job is to collect the souls of people dancing to the sound of cumbia. Her destiny and that of the city will be affected when she falls in love with Fanny, the dance teacher, whose life she spares, thus altering the natural order of death in the country. The decision will bring with it fatal consequences for Karina and her beloved.
title: Karina: muerte, amor y cumbia
